messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many magic points is it cost for a gnoph-keh to summon a blizzard?
1 magic point per hour
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many yards is the radius of a blizzard when a gnoph-keh summons it?
100 yards
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many hit points can an investigator lose due to freezing damage?
1 hit point
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How often does an investigator need to make a CON roll to avoid freezing damage?
Every 15 minutes
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What happens to an investigator's hit points every 15 minutes in a blizzard?
They must make a CON roll or lose 1 hit point to freezing damage.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How much does the temperature drop for an hour in a 100-yard radius if a gnoph-keh expends 1 magic point?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average damage bonus for a gnoph-keh?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average number of magic points a gnoph-keh has?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the temperature drop for an hour in a 100-yard radius when the Gnoph-Keh spends magic?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the average damage bonus for Gnoph-keh attacks?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many attacks can a Gnoph-Keh make per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many Horn Gore attacks can a Gnoph-Keh make per round?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the function of the four slender grey stalks?
four slender grey stalks bearing flowerlike appendages
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the function of the eight greenish antennae or tentacles?
eight greenish antennae or tentacles
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What were the stalks on the creature's head made of?
slender grey
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How many antennae did the creature have on its nether side?
eight
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was the base of the central cone made of?
rubbery grey substance
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What were the cone-shaped beings that the time-traveling entities took over?
the cone-shaped beings dwelling here
